member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.VS.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.VS.Actions.AbstractActionHandler`1
member.summary: Abstract action handler class. Helps to work with action handlers as with the shell components, thus allowing to use dependency injection.

member.summary: Creation method for . Don't cache the value you return, this is done by the base impl.

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.VS.DotCoverPackage.Info
member.summary: Package description, mostly for shell-less installers.

member.summary: The short assembly name of the .NET class that implements the package ().

member.summary: An FQN of the .NET class that implements the package ().

member.summary: Name of the company, as specified in the Package Key registered at Microsoft.

member.summary: Guid of the .NET class that implements the package ().
